InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-221 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 2
Missiles: 2xS1

Behring’s MSD-221 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 2 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: TaskForce I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 1

Venturing into the weapons market, Thermyte Concern have pooled their extensive knowledge of demolition explosives to create the TaskForce. A lightweight EM tracking strike missile with a top-in-class propulsion system provides an efficient mixture of speed and firepower to establish battlefield dominance.

The Bulwark shield generator provides industrial-grade durability and increased performance, but at the expense of a higher emission level.

For its class, the Roughneck power plant from Juno Starwerk is an ideal component for haulers looking for maximum performance.

Keep your ship working harder for longer with the durable Hydrocel, an entry-level industrial cooler from respected manufacturer Juno Starwerk.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

InstalledItem.Description:

Class: Civilian

Experience why WillsOp is a premiere manufacturer of ship electronics with their Capston radar. Outfit your ship with one today so you know what’s nearby.
